1.content:
As we haven't gotten into the story yet, these first few chapters will be the setup. Here are the main methods you can choose from for the thief to use to steal the girl's identities:

Possession: The thief hijacks the body of their target. The original is trapped deep within or removed from the body. (Possible easiest access to semblance and memories.)

Body Swap: Self-explanatory. The thief switches bodies with their target in some manner.

Transformation: The thief alters their body somehow to appear as their victim/target.

Replica: Basically a clone body of the target, in every sense of the manner. This option is tricky as the thief is either the clone itself or someone using a clone body of there target.

Disguise: Wearing something(s) over your body to appear as the target. This could be a 'special' bodysuit or just a regular disguise, like the ones in movies were they use wigs, clothes, etc.

Now, which will you choose from? Remember once you pick a method you have to choose how they do it, (The 'How' is called a Sub-method here), I'll stop clarifying after this chapter.
1.title: The Main Method

11.content:
Now how will the identity thief possess their target?

Possession Semblance: The thief has some kind of semblance they can use to possess another person.

Magic Ritual: Using a magic ritual, the thief sends their soul into the body of their target and takes over. Note: You can either push the previous owner's soul out or trap them inside the body for the thief's own use. (May or may not need requirement[s]. Your choice when you make the story segment.)

Nanobots: The thief uses Nanobots to infiltrate the body of the target and transfers the thief's mind into the target's body.

Merge Phasing: The thief phases their body into the target's body, leaving no trace of their former self. The thief is able to phase out of merge parts of their body with their target. Giving the target's body better or even new traits/'assets' while the thief is occupying it.

Of course, there is room for other ideas that are spiritual, technology-based, or magical. Like a Mind Transfer Machine, Being a Ghost, or even some manner of wishing. You just need to think of something that's a little different from the options presented.
11.title: Possession

choices: Yeah. You know what? Why not someone from another series?
111.content:
Now who this the identity thief?

Remember: The Possession Semblance should belong to a character who don't have confirmed semblances. I don't know if duel semblances are a thing but I'd rather not try something of that sort.

Or perhaps you'd like to make a character with a Possession Semblance? Maybe bring in a character from another series who unlocks the RWBY soul power stuff and their semblance is possession?
111.title: Possession Semblance

1112.content:
Okay, original characters.

Instead of making a profile of a list of Original characters, I'm going to start off by using a word to describe what this original character is like. From whether there current/former occupation to something else.

If 'Other' is picked, you can do the same thing or just make a profile of an original character.

So the identity is...
1112.title: Original Character

11123.content:
A criminal who is on the run from police.

OR

A eldery man wishing for youth.
11123.title: Other

111232.content:
You sure you want the Old Man wanting youth?

Or do you want something else?
111232.title: (Sorry Leaving room for more options.)

1112322.content: How about a childhood friend of one of the girls?
1112322.title: Other

11123221.content: My name is Sapphira. Sapphira Aquafield and I'm the childhood friend of Ruby. I'm a maiden but one day while I was out training in the field, I got a new semblance that ignited within me. I don't know what it is but I'm going to test it out so I went back to my dorm where the rest of my team was before I spotted Cinder. Seeing Cinder, I smirked as I known who my test subject was going to be so I walked over to Cinder who had her back towards me before I activated my new semblance and entered Cinder from behind which caused Cinder's eyes to roll into the back of her head as I continued to invade into her body as she was squirming on the outside. Four hours passed before Cinder's eyes rolled back down and fainted while on the inside, I won control of her body and started to spread myself throughout her body. Few more minutes have passed before I opened my new eyes and stood up as I looked over Cinder/my body as I smirked. "I can't believed that worked." I said as I heard Cinder's voice coming out of my mouth. Oh, I'm going to enjoy Cinder's body.
11123221.title: Sapphira to Cinder

113.content:
So who uses Nanobots to possess someone in RWBY?

Someone from a Team at Beacon?

What about Criminals like Roman Torchwick or Neopolitan?

Or someone else in mind?
113.title: Nanobots

choices: She hands it over the container to the client
1132.content:
The day was quiet. The compound totally silent. The Atlas military research base was totally silent as the guard looked out over the dusty expanse before him. The very same reddish sand lay for about twenty meters until it was halted by a sudden, large concrete wall that ended in thick coils of barbed wire. He was dressed in a white shirt with a grey tie. His trousers were the same grey and his feet were clad in black, leather shoes.

Slowly, the guard sipped from his steaming cup of coffee, making his glasses fog up. With a growl of annoyance, he takes them off and starts to wipe them with a small cloth he’d pulled from his breast pocket. As he did, a shadow nipped over the wall, using a sheet of some kind to cover the wire. It drops down and dashes to his small, lit booth. Just as he puts on his glasses, it vanishes out of sight, unspotted.

The guard goes back to his usual routine, only to be interrupted by a thin wire begin pulled around his neck, silencing him as he was garroted from behind. His body falls after a few more seconds struggle and a short woman with brown and pink hair steps out of the booth, dusting herself off, now dressed in a replica of the guard’s uniform. They put on the guard’s belt and casually stroll into one of the hangars, using the stolen ID to enter.

After gaining access, the woman makes short work of the two guards inside before subduing the only scientist on duty using a single strike of a glass coffee pot. Now alone, she smirks and strolls with a nonchalant attitude towards the container she was sent to retrieve. She quickly opens the containment and picks it up. Quickly, she leaves and exits using a jeep she took using a note to pass the gate guard and claiming she was “on a late shift snack run.”

And, like the sun at sundown, she vanished into the desert horizon… Now in possession of one of the most powerful unconventional weapons ever conceived and the only blueprints of how to make more…
1132.title: Criminals

114.content:
So who or what has their body phase and merge with the body of a female in RWBY?

Is it someone from Team RWBY somehow?

Or perhaps a Creature of Grimm? The Geist Grimm is possession based, so it fits (https://rwby.fandom.com/wiki/Geist). The Apathy Grimm from Vol. 6 are human shaped too(https://rwby.fandom.com/wiki/Apathy).

Or is there something else in mind?
114.title: Merge Phasing

Don't forget we've got some villain factions as well!

Criminals like Mercury Black, and Roman Torchwick...

There's also the White Fang, with Adam Taurus, and the Albain brothers...

Or are we trying to go with even LESSER know baddies? Junior was a character, right? ...right?
1143.title: How About Some Villains

choices: Other/Make some of the Body Swap Machine's swapping methods as different options
12.content:
A classic. How will the thief which bodies with their desired target?

Semblance: Someone has a semblance that allows them to switch souls between bodies? (Doesn't even have to be the thief who has this semblance.)

Swap Spell: Someone uses magic to switch their body/mind/soul with someone or their choosing. The casters get the body or their target and the target end us in the caster's body unless there is more than two spell caught in the spell. (Doesn't even have to be the thief who casts the spell.)

Body Swap Remote: It's being limited to it's 'Body Swap' button, Undo Button, and Full Reset Button. Its range and amount of targets can be adjusted. It's a remote that swap people around. The remote follows it's user around. (Doesn't even have to be the thief who uses the remote.)

Body Swap Machine: The thief and their target are hooked up to a machine that switches them around. This could be in various forms like the usual shock of electricity, Aura transfer/exchange, or even brain transplant.

Unless you have something else in mind? Or have the methods the 'Body Swap Machine' can cause body swaps, like Brain Transplant or Aura Transfer, as different options available?
12.title: Body Swapping

124.content:
Who discovers/owns/or uses a Body Swap Machine?

Someone from Atlas?

One of the bad guys in the show?

Or something else or someone?
124.title: Body Swap Machine

1243.content:
Let's introduce some of the good guys as options since I picked Atlas instead of the norm.

Does someone from Team RWBY have this machine?

Or maybe someone from Beacon's Staff?

There are still other choices too.
1243.title: Other

choices: He starts to hear other voices in his head
He feels how powerful he is now
124332.content:
An adventurer was searching the mountains looking for something to do with his day as he had just finished a task by an agency that required him to collect a set of specific materials. Just then something caught the edge of his eye as a cave was visible from the distance and it appeared that some lights were being displaced from there. So he got up and decided to go there to see and check what was going on in there.

The trip there was relatively esay as it appeared that someone had just gone there and cleared the path for him to scale and walk to.¨What am I getting myself into. Probably nothing just overthinking it¨. He thought as he reached the location and saw what looked like a lab from one of those sci-fi movies. As the lab had many long tubes with some white liquids floating through them. But what really interested him was a machine which had 2 vials and 1 was already filled. When you went to investigate what the machine was and what it did a string pulled itself and pinch his arm drawing some blood from him.

¨Hey what gives stupid machine¨. He yelled as he feeled weaker than before. ¨Oh come on now Im druged as well could this day get any worse¨. He says as he faints.

When he woke up again he was in a different place and position from before as he was now seated in a large enviroment.

¨Hey what is this¨. He says as he noticed his voice was now different. He then rappidly went to search for a mirror to see himself and found himself looking like someone else. And not just someone else. But the villanous Saleem! Just then something happened.
124332.title: Someone else.

choices: Continue the story from late chapter: "He feels how powerful he is now"
1243322.content:
Uh... Hey. I asked for writers to leave options for other people to express creative ideas. I'll leave the chapter because we do get a swap.

More options or continue from the last segment?
1243322.title: Hold on one sec!

13.content:
Now how will the thief go about transforming into their desired target?

Magic Spell: The thief uses a magic spell to transform themselves into the target. (May or may not need requirement[s].)

Magic Ritual: The thief performs a ritual to change their body into the form of their target. (May or may not need requirement[s].)

Magic Doll: It's a magical doll that changes its appearance base on whose ever DNA or belonging it touches. Its owner can use the doll to transform themselves into whatever appearance the doll has.

Transformation Machine: A machine that transforms the thief's body into another person's appearance. The machine could have large pods to get into or something else.

Or do you have your own creative ideas? A Semblance? Transformation Remote? Or something else? Be creative! The 'Other' option is there for a reason!
13.title: Transformation

133.content:
Who owns this magical doll?

Someone from a team at Beacon?

Someone from Salem's faction?

Or something else?
133.title: Magic Doll

choices: Replica Route (Clone in Body, someone else's mind)
14.content:
Now the Replica route is a strange one as you have either two options:

Clone Route: The identity thief is actually a clone of a character in RWBY. The clone is trying to take over the position of their original self and live their life while trying to remove the original from the picture. (However, you can have the clone and original befriend each other but the clone cannot gain their own identity. The clone has to go on impersonating their original, sharing the same identity.)

Replica Body Route: In this route, the thief is using a clone body to steal the identity of someone. The thief abandons their old body for the clone one somehow. (Clone Body of the target, but someone else's mind.)

Now, which will you choose?
14.title: Replica/Clone Route

141.content:
Full Clarification: This route means the clone is the identity thief, trying to take the place of the original (unless the original and clone befriend each other and decide to live the same life) Once you pick who the clone is then the story is a go unless you want to make options as to how the clone is here.

So...who is the clone?

Is the clone someone from Team RWBY?

Or from Team JNPR?

Or someone else?
141.title: Clone Route (Full Clone)

1412.content:
Boy?

Or girl?

Or maybe Team RWBY instead?
1412.title: Team JNPR

142.content: Replica it is. Now, to choose the person to replicate! Which team will have a copied member?
142.title: Replica Route (Clone in Body, someone else'...

1422.content: You have selected Team JNPR! Now, you must choose between the boys and the girls! Or maybe both!
1422.title: Team JNPR.

14222.content:
Girls it is! Who shall you choose?

The lovely and talented Pyrrha Nikos?

Or the bubbly and hyper Nora Valkyrie?
14222.title: Girl

142221.content: So, what kind of replica will be made of Pyrrha? A living replica? Or a mechanical one?
142221.title: Pyrrha Nikos

15.content:
How will you go about this? Will you do the classic style or bodysuits?

Bodysuits: A magical suit that looks like a person. The thief wears it other their own body and magically become them regardless of proportion difference. Their actual body is inside the suit but the suit feels real and is pretty much indistinguishable from the real thing.

Classic Style: It's basically where the thief dresses up and looks like the target by dressing up in similar clothes, copying their hairstyle, height, weight, mimicking their voice, using contacts to change eye color, wearing a wig/copying hairstyle and color, etc. All in a real and natural manner. No semblances, Magic, etc.

Now, these seem like the two available routes for this method but if someone comes up thinks of something else then there is two options to present what is.
15.title: Disguise by clothing?

info.brief_description: Someone is stealing one or more identities of female characters in RWBY!
info.description:
This is an Alternative Universe of the RWBY-verse. Someone or something is stealing the identity of the female characters in RWBY. However, as this is an interactive story, you get to say who, how, and why. Please read and respect the rules to see how the beginning chapters are laid out as you pick from the Main Method and how it's done(Sub-Method) before picking your thief and their target. I've tried to break it down into sections for you to read.

Disclaimer: I own nothing of RWBY. All property goes to there rightful owners.

Rules:

About the Theives
• A thief MUST be able to impersonate the victim in some manner, including their Semblance. (The thief can have Semblance(s) be similar, taken, or perhaps copied from the victim depending on your theft method.)
• There can be MULTIPLE thieves, depending on their relationship or recruitment. Though only start out with one.
• A thief can switch between victims ONLY IF the original can come back to take their rightful place or get another thief to take their place.
• Guys can only be thieves. Not victims. Sorry.
• A thief can be either doing this for temporary time or permanently. Regardless, we should see how they live with their stolen life.
• Grimm can be used as thieves.
• If you can, give a reason for the Identity Theft on whichever person.
• A thief can be either doing this for temporary time or permanently. Regardless, we should see how they live with their stolen life.
• Original Characters are allowed but DO NOT make them as self-inserts. Other people will be using these characters too.
• The ‘Replica’ route must have the clone as the identity thief to their respective original character unless it's a clone body but someone else in mind and soul. (This is a bit of a complex route to understand.)
• Try to accurately write any of the characters in RWBY. You can slightly alter their persona to justify the identity theft.


Main Theft Method Options:
Possession: The thief hijacks the body of their target. The original is trapped deep within or removed from the body. (Possible easiest access to semblance and memories.)
Body Swap: Self-explanatory. The thief switches bodies with their target in some manner.
Transformation: The thief alters their body somehow to appear as their victim/target.
Replica: Basically a clone body of the target, in every sense of the manner. The thief’s body is in its original state, unless the clone itself is the thief.
Disguise: Wearing something(s) over your body to appear as the target.

About Submethods:
• Sub-Methods of theft (How to possess, body swap, etc. with a target) can be made. (Ex. For Possession you can either use soul, a slime, piece of clothing, etc.) Warning: if someone does the Swap Remote, it can only have the Body Swap button, the other buttons effect range and who is being swapped, and the remote must stay with the user.
• Semblances can be a sub-method to be used but these can only be on Original characters or RWBY character who hasn’t gotten their semblances confirmed at this point. (Ex. Roman Torchwick, Sienna Khan, Prof Port, or other characters from Vol. 3)

General
• Sexual themes are allowed. Except for things like rape.
• No Gore, vore, or anything of the sort. Try to keep the fetishes to the theme here, there are other stories where you can do that stuff.
• Please try to refrain from sudden or abrupt endings. Try to keep the story flowing with plenty of options.
• Have good grammar. Try to check over spelling. If you miss a typo, that’s fine as long there aren’t too many.
• Try to make any story segments at least around two paragraphs or more.
• The beginning takes place before Vol. 3.
• Enjoy and have fun.
